data.prayer: Father, grace the churches in Ganganagar, Rajasthan, India with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Ganganagar, Rajasthan, India
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every one of the 21,661 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.
Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Ganganagar, Rajasthan, India so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.prayer: Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 1,923,646, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Pajavgir people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Ganganagar, Rajasthan, India today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Ganganagar, Rajasthan, India a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the county.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, comfort those who mourn in Ganganagar, Rajasthan, India.
data.verse: Blessed are those who mourn, for they will be comforted.
